name: Blessing of the Watch
source: Pathfinder #8: Seven Days to the Grave pg. 71
area: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
text: This spell functions like bless, except as noted. It works only in the caster’s home city, and in areas under the jurisdiction of the city watch. For example, if the watch patrols a shantytown outside the city walls but not the ruined subterranean tunnels that lie beneath the city, the spell works in the former area but not the latter.
area_zh: 施法者, 以及以施法者为中心半径50尺爆发区域内的所有盟友
text_zh: 此法术像祝福术(bless)那样运作，除了上面写的。它只能在施法者的家乡城市生效，具体来说是处于城市看守司法管理下的区域。举个例子，如果看守巡视城市墙外的棚户区，但没有去城市已废弃的地下隧道，那么前者会受法术影响，而后者不会。
